attributes.action: Allow gay and bisexual men to give blood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created because as a bisexual man I am not allowed to give blood. I have a rare blood type and therefore believe that I should be allowed to give blood, but due to my sexuality, I cannot. I cannot think of any good reason why a gay or bisexual man with a clean bill of health is not allowed to give blood.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
